titleStmt.title: The problemes of Aristotle with other philosophers and phisitions. Wherein are contayned diuers questions, with their answers, touching the estate of mans bodie.
Problemata. Latin.
titleStmt.author: Aristotle, attributed anme. aut
Zimara, Marc Antonio, 1460-1523.
Alexander, of Aphrodisias.

notesStmt.note: Not in fact by Aristotle; the attribution is traditional.
Leaves cropped at head, affecting some running titles.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
